<js>
function browserLogin() {
  try {
    java.startBrowserAwait(
      "https://qidian.com", 
      "登录"
    )
  } catch (e) {}
  let ywkey = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywkey")
  let ywguid = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywguid")
  java.toast(ywkey)
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
      guid: ywguid,
      key: ywkey,
      uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
}

function login() {}

function tokenLogin() {
  if (source.getLoginInfoMap() == null) {
    java.toast("未获取到LoginInfoMap，请尝试重新打开登录UI再按一遍")
  }
  let ywguid = source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywguid"]
  let ywkey = source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywkey"]
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: ywguid,
    key: ywkey,
    uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  java.toast("凭据保存成功")
}

function fixInformation() {
  let h = getLoginHeader()
  if (!Packages.android.text.TextUtils.isEmpty(h.uid)) {
    java.toast("您的登录信息是完整的，不需要补全")
    return
  }
  let ywkey = h.key
  let ywguid = h.guid
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: ywguid,
    key: ywkey,
    uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
  java.toast("成功")
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
}

function proxyExcWrapper(fun) {
  try {
    fun()
  } catch (e) {
    java.log(e.toString() + e.stack)
  }
}

function tutorial() {
  java.toast("如果你是群里原书源用户，请点一下获取信息")
}

ruleBookInfo.author: Author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var Regs = [/bookId=(\d+)/i, /\.com\D+?\/(\d+)/i, /(\d+)/i];
var bookId = "";
for (let Reg of Regs) {
    let mat = baseUrl.match(Reg);
    if (mat) {
        bookId = mat[1];
        break;
    }
}
java.ajax(QDSign("v2/bookdetail/get", [
    "bookId=" + bookId
]))
</js>

ruleContent.content: let info = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result)) let content = "" let header = getLoginHeader() switch (info.source) { case "qd": let bid = java.hexDecodeToString(java.ajax(book.tocUrl)) let cid = info.cid if (info.isVip) { let url = `https://ksapp.qidian.com/ajax/chapter/getInfo?debug=1&bookId=${bid}&chapterId=${cid}&_csrfToken,` + JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2', Connection: 'Keep-Alive', 'platformType': 'android', Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/', 'content-type': 'application/json', Cookie: `ywguid=${header.guid}; ywkey=${header.key}` } }) let body = JSON.parse(java.log(java.ajax(url))).data let user = body.user body = body.chapterInfo content = body.content if (body.vipStatus && !body.limitFree && !body.isBuy) { content += ("\n=============\n试读结束，继续阅读请 [购买]\n本章价格: " + body.price + "点") } } else { let request = QDSign("v2/bookcontent/safegetcontent", [ "bookId=" + bid, "chapterId=" + cid ], "", true) let body = getBytes(request.url, request.headers) let decrypt = dContentQD(cid, body) let raw = JSON.parse(decrypt) let cArr = raw.Content.split("\r\n") let blocks = {} for (let i of raw.Blocks) { blocks[i.Sort] = i } for (let i = 0; i < cArr.length; i++) { content += cArr[i] + "\n" if (blocks[i + 1] && blocks[i + 1].Type == "image") content += `\n` } } } content

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

function getFanqieCookie() {
    try {
        return String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || '');
    } catch (e) {
        return '';
    }
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var fqsjurl = (getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken).replace(/=/g, '%3D');
if (!fqsjurl) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
    }
fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&cookie=" + fqsjurl;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';
var hasValidCookie = getFanqieCookie().length > 0;

if (device === 'android' && hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var cookieParam = encodeURIComponent(getFanqieCookie());
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie=" + cookieParam;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);
            
            if (!(response && response.data)) {
                  }

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + value.join(","),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("分组获取失败: " + e.message);
                    }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var sessionid = cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid") || '';
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?sessionid=" + encodeURIComponent(sessionid);
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);
        
        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: "",
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        }];
        
        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("操作失败: " + e.message);
            }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl =  `${base_url}/discover_style?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.style_list || [];
    java.toast(result.msg);
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
// java.log(u)
if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
else u = u.substring(7)
let uArr = u.split("/")
uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
let uArr2 = []
uArr.forEach((x) => {
    if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
    else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
	})
u = uArr2.join("/")
return u
	}
  let list = [];
  let resultData = JSON.parse(result).data;
   //java.toast(resultData)
  let data;
  if (resultData != null && resultData.book_shelf_info) {
    data = resultData.book_shelf_info;
    if (data != null) {
    let requestData = { books: [] };
    for (let i in data) {
      requestData["books"].push({
        book_id: data[i]["book_id"],
        item_id: "0",
      });
    }
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(resultData.book_shelf_info))
    let booksData = java.ajax(
      'https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{method: "post",body: ' +
        JSON.stringify(requestData) +
        "}"
    );
    // java.log(booksData)
    let books =  JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
      let d = books[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        word_number: d.word_number,
        book_id: d.book_id,
      });
    }
    }
  } else if (JSON.parse(result).book_list != null) {
    data = JSON.parse(result).book_list;
    for(let i in data){
      let d = data[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        author: d.author,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        book_id: d.book_id,
      });
    }
  } else if (resultData != null && resultData.list) {
    data = resultData.list;
    for(let i in data){
      let d = data[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        author: d.author,
        book_name: d.bookName,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumbUri),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        category: d.category,
        book_id: d.bookId,
      });
    }
  } else if (resultData != null  && (resultData.data || resultData.result)) {
    if(resultData.result){
        data = resultData.result;
    } else{
        data = resultData.data;
    }
    for(let i in data){
      let d = data[i];
      //let book = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id="+d.book_id)).data
      //lastChapterTitle = book.book_info.last_chapter_title + "·"  + java.timeFormat(d.last_publish_time * 1000)
      list.push({
        src: d,
        author: d.author,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        word_number: d.word_number,
        gender: d.gender,
        category: d.category,
        score: d.score,
        last_publish_time: d.last_chapter_update_time,
        book_id: d.book_id,
      });
    }
  } else list = JSON.parse(result)[0].content
  JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$[*]

{{$.introinfo.book.lastChapterName##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字].*?[】）\)]}}•{{$.chapinfo.lastChapterUpdateTime##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content: #main@html##小说免费阅读，请收藏　全本免费小说【qbmfxs.com】
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##.*本章未完|点击.*下一页.*|上一页|目录|下一页|继续阅读

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.content:
<js>
vid = java.hexDecodeToString(result);

// 真实链接解密
function decode(str) {
  url = source.getKey() + "/api/app/docs-listen/" + str + "/ting-with-efi"; 
  res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
  id = res.id.replaceAll("-", "");
  efi = res.efi;
  cT = res.creationTime.replace(/[-:T.]/g, "").replace(" ", "").padEnd(20, "0");
// 生成key
function gk(e, t) {
  let n = "";
  for (let i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
    n += String.fromCharCode(e[i].charCodeAt(0) + Number(t[i]));
  }
  for (let i = 20; i < e.length; i++) {
    n += String.fromCharCode(e[i].charCodeAt(0) + Number(t[i - 20]));
  }
  return java.base64Encode(n);
}
// 生成iv
function gi(e, t) {
  let n = "";
  for (let i = 20; i > 4; i--) {
    n += String.fromCharCode(e[i].charCodeAt(0) + Number(t[i - 1]));
  }
  return java.base64Encode(n);
}
  key = gk(id, cT); iv = gi(id, cT);
  ef = (efi + "").replace(/\n*$/g, "").replace(/\n/g, "");
  url = java.aesDecodeArgsBase64Str(ef, key, 'CBC', 'PKCS7Padding', iv);
  return encodeURI(url);
}

// 接口ip获取
value = String(source.getVariable())
v = JSON.parse(java.aesDecodeArgsBase64Str(value, "le95G3hnFDJsBE+1/v9eYw==", 'CBC', 'PKCS7Padding', "IvswQFEUdKYf+d1wKpYLTg=="));
ipv6 = v[0].Scheme + "://[" + v[0].Value + "]:" + v[0].Port
ipv4 = v[1].Scheme + "://" + v[1].Value + ":" + v[1].Port
url = ipv6 + decode(vid)
if (java.connect(url).code() != 200) url = ipv4 + decode(vid)
url
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')

.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')

.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

元素的文本内容，保持原有顺序 var paragraphs = dd.select('p'); var paragraphTexts = []; for (var j = 0; j < paragraphs.size(); j++) { var paragraph = paragraphs.get(j); paragraphTexts.push(paragraph.text()); } list.push({ id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性 paragraphs: paragraphTexts // 存储所有

元素的文本内容为数组，保持原有顺序 }); // 合并文本内容，每个

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

searchUrl:
https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=
@js:
u="https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword=submit="
loc=java.get(u,{})
lo=String(loc.headers("location"||"Location")).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,"$1")
code=loc.statusCode()
if(code>=301){
uu=source.key+lo
java.log(uu)
re=java.ajax(uu)
java.log(uu)
na=re.match(/" name="(.*)" v/)[1]
va=re.match(/value="(.*)"\/\>/)[1]
no=re.match(/bute\("value","(.*)"\),d/)[1]
bd=`${na}=${va}&nonce=${no}`
java.log(bd)
url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=,"+JSON.stringify({
  "body": bd,
  "method": "POST",
    	})}else{url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit="}

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

list=java.getElements('.g')
c=java.getElements('.content')
for(i=0;i<list.length;i++){
	text=list[i].select('a').text()
	href=list[i].select('a').attr('href')
	author=list[i].select('font').text()
	desc=c[i].text()
	data.push(JSON.stringify({
		text,href,desc,author
	}))
}
data
</js>

}

text@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let regex = /var c="([^"]*)"/;
let dd = result.match(regex)[1]

let j = java.base64Decode(dd);
  //java.log(j)
  jja=String(j).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
  if(/=/.test(jja)){jj=jja.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=jja.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
  
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("@@.read-content@p!0@html");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)
</js>

<js>
//md5加密开始
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",
    WordToHexValueTemp = "",
    lByte, lCount;
    for (lCount = 0; lCount <= 3; lCount++) {
        lByte = (lValue >>> (lCount * 8)) & 255;
        WordToHexValueTemp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
        WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValueTemp.substr(WordToHexValueTemp.length - 2, 2)
    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {
    string = string.replace(/\x0d\x0a/g, "\x0a");
    var output = "";
    for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
        var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
        if (c < 128) {
            output += String.fromCharCode(c)
        } else if ((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        } else {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
            output += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        }
    }
    return output;
};
function md5(string) {
    var x = Array();
    var k, AA, BB, CC, DD, a, b, c, d;
    var S11 = 7,
    S12 = 12,
    S13 = 17,
    S14 = 22;
    var S21 = 5,
    S22 = 9,
    S23 = 14,
    S24 = 20;

    S33 = 16,
    S34 = 23;

    S42 = 10,
    S43 = 15,
    S44 = 21;

    a = 0x67452301;

ruleContent.content:
<js>
result=java.getElements("#txt p")
result.sort((a,b)=>a.attr("data-id")-b.attr("data-id"))
result.select("p")
</js>
##.*第\d\/\d页.*|.*本章未完.*|.*www\..*

ruleBookInfo.author: a
ruleBookInfo.name: n

ruleToc.chapterName:
{{@@tag.a@text}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();

);
with(javaImport){
    function encrypt(str){
        var bArr = String(str).getBytes("UTF-8");
        var mac = Mac.getInstance("HmacSHA256");
        mac .init(SecretKeySpec(String("wj3imab73kwceuf51lf01ORHe2cmo8X0YrZwF4p2uv3WEfmqxrT2oIBwRFRNErXW20UKal15ZTDdxPKU43puZFqcuXkvrQmadhp1wn6YPEDO4WRgInp8NNNQo4uNsWF1CELOzx7yPOS4pQbhTRWB4qRm0a4ENIegN0SH7K2STbsyaCuWh7m7s3rTpb5dK3CcDdsT35vo0xNbPZI2dJmKoIeKk9p3YhBLNWp9WoZqn9Qihpvn4nvgJzVSacgy2MTo").getBytes("UTF-8"),"HmacSHA256"));
        return mac.doFinal(bArr)
    }

        }
        var length = bArr.length * 8;

            return "";
        }
        var i10 = length % 24;
        var i11 = parseInt(length / 24);

                var b10 = bArr[i13];

                var b15 = i19 & 255;
                var i20 = b11 & -128;
                var i21 = b11 >> 4;

                }

                cArr[i14] = cArr2[b15];

ruleBookInfo.init:
@js:
$ = _ => java.getString(_,result)
list={
html:result,
n:$("[property~=book_name]@content"),
a:$("[property$=author]@content"),
k:$("[property~=category|status|update_time]@content"),
w:$(".caption-bookinfo span.1@text"),
l:$("[property$=lastest_chapter_name]@content"),
i:$("[property$=description]@content"),
c:$("[property$=image]@content"),
t:$(".bookmore@class.btn-primary@href")
}
JSON.stringify(list)
ruleBookInfo.name: n

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
list=JSON.parse(result).sources
Json=[]
for(i in list){
list1=JSON.parse(result).sources[i].details.data;
for(j in list1){
if(list1[j].title.indexOf(java.get('key'))>-1){
Json.push(list1[j])
}
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>
$.[*]

ruleContent.content: do{ t=Date();t1=Number(t.charAt(17));t2=Number(t.charAt(19));t3=Number(t.charAt(20));t4=Number(t.charAt(22));t5=Number(t.charAt(23)); //var t=new Date(); //year=t.getFullYear(); //java.log("🍊"+year); n=(t2+t4)%6*1000+t1*100+t3*10+t5; r=java.ajax("http://m.wufazhuce.com/article/"+n.toString()); java.setContent(r); } while(r.includes("404 Not Found")); //获取4个随机数其中第一个数小于6，大概大于5919无内容，并访问网址 chapter.title=java.getString('class.text-title@text'); chapter.url="http://m.wufazhuce.com/article/"+n.toString(); //传出标题 s=String(java.getString('class.text-content@html')); //获取正文内容 if(s.includes("]*src\=\"([^"]+?)(\?imageView[^"]+)?\"[^>]*>/g,'')} //判断正文是否有图片并处理 else if(s.includes("")){s=s.replace(//,"")} if(source.getVariable()<=0||source.getVariable()=="NaN"||book.variable==null){ book.variable=""; source.setVariable(39); } else{ source.setVariable(source.getVariable()-1); } book.variable+="\n★"+chapter.title+"\n"+s; book.variable;

.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
